modality_alignment.interpretation: No significant correlation - visual features may not align with user preferences

visual_manifold.interpretation: No meaningful visual clustering - visual features may not align with categories

bpr_hardness.interpretation: Moderate negative difficulty - room for improvement
bpr_hardness.recommendation: Consider mixing random and hard negative sampling

graph_connectivity.interpretation: PASS: Giant component covers 99.9% of items (threshold: 50.0%). Graph is sufficiently connected for LATTICE.

feature_collapse.interpretation: PASS: Avg cosine similarity = 0.496 (threshold: 0.5). Features show good variance. Visual encoder is producing discriminative embeddings.

semantic_alignment.interpretation: Very weak correlation (r=0.0250): Text descriptions do NOT predict user behavior. Users likely buy based on visual appeal, brand, or price rather than descriptions.
semantic_alignment.recommendation: Deprioritize text encoder in final model, or use text only as filter/fallback.

cross_modal_consistency.interpretation: LOW cross-modal agreement (avg=0.009): Text and image embeddings point in different directions. This indicates a fundamental mismatch - either descriptions don't match images, or encoders have domain shift.
cross_modal_consistency.recommendation: Investigate: (1) Check if product images match descriptions, (2) Fine-tune encoders on domain, (3) Use separate modality branches.

cca_alignment.interpretation: STRONG CCA correlation (0.903). Good linear relationship between modalities.
cca_alignment.recommendation: MICRO contrastive loss should converge well.

anisotropy.interpretation: ANISOTROPIC: Avg cosine = 0.496 (>0.4). Centering FIXED the issue: after centering = 0.000. Embeddings were in a narrow cone but centering spread them out.
anisotropy.recommendation: Apply mean centering to all embeddings before using in MRS models. This should significantly improve LATTICE/MICRO performance.

user_consistency.interpretation: MODERATE CONSISTENCY: Some visual preference signal exists. Local (0.475) < Global (0.504). Ratio = 0.941.
user_consistency.recommendation: Visual features have some predictive power. Consider combining with text features for better performance.
